rules_text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put the card with the highest mana value from among them into your hand. You may cast another nonland card from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest at the bottom of your library in any order.
notes:
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/39PKLo



OG_1:
Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put the card with the highest mana value from among them into your hand. You may cast the nonland card with the lowest mana value from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest at the bottom of your library in any order.
